bloques.subtitulo: You want to shop online more securely
instrucciones: You'd like to make a safer online purchase
Without sharing or filling in personal data
In just one click, personal and payment data included
Your personal bank offers you the option to generate your own credential to make secure online purchases

bloques.texto: Imagine a digital wallet on your phone that, instead of storing money or credit cards, holds verifiable credentials. Think of them as important documents but in a digital and secure format (ID, passport, degrees, etc.).

Verifiable credential wallets give users full control over their data. You decide what information to share and with whom. For example, if you only need to prove your age to access a service, you can share just your date of birth without revealing your entire identity.
First, install one of the compatible applications on your smartphone. You can view the QR by tapping on the icons.

modalItems.title: Download Procivis on your phone
modalItems.sub: Scan this QR code with your phone or use the store buttons. You can also search for "Procivis" in your app store.

modalItems.title: Complete the process in the app to activate your wallet.

ui.modalSubtitle: Download the app and complete the process
ui.extraStep: Click on the app to get the download QR
